thread.title: Fuller House: Meet Kimmy's Hot and Passionate Ex-Husband
thread.title_full: Fuller House: Meet Kimmy's Hot and Passionate Ex-Husband - seattlepi.com

author: Shelli Weinstein, TV GUIDE
title: Fuller House: Meet Kimmy's Hot and Passionate Ex-Husband
text:
Fuller House has found Kimmy Gibbler's man - or rather, ex-man.
Juan Pablo Di Pace has joined the Netflix series as Kimmy's (Andrea Barber) ex-husband Fernando, TVLine reports. Fernando is unflinching as he tries to win Kimmy back, despite the fact that his tendency to be "inappropriately passionate" is part of why they divorced. The two have a daughter named Ramona.
Fuller House : Steve's back! See the first photo
In the revival series, Kimmy and DJ's ( Candace Cameron Bure ) sister Stephanie ( Jodie Sweetin ) move in to help raise DJ's sons after her husband dies. Surely Fernando will be stopping by often to visit his daughter and attempt to impress his ex.
Di Pace previously appeared on Dallas , A.D. The Bible Continues and Camp .
Fuller House is set to premiere on Netflix next year.
Video: John Stamos clears up Olsen twins Fuller House feud: "I love them dearly"
